thread.title: Bored? 100+ Things You Can Do Right Now
thread.title_full: Bored? 100+ Things You Can Do Right Now

author: Ashley Paige
title: Bored? 100+ Things You Can Do Right Now
text:
Things to Do When You're Bored Bored? 100+ Things You Can Do Right Now February 1, 2017 by Ashley Paige 22.8K Shares 
To certain busy people, boredom's a serious blessing. But if you're struggling to find something to do every single weekend, it feels more like a curse. If you fall in the latter category, take a look at our list ahead. We present you 117 things to do besides watch TV (which, let's face it, is pretty mind-numbing). With these activities, you'll snap out of the lull and feel better fast! Write in a journal.
